bibl.title: A Clarification of fo›nij monÒjulow and fo›nij kayarÒw / =uparÒw. <phoinix monoxulos, phoinix katharos / rhuparos>
bibl.note: Fo›nij monÒjulow (date clusters) and fo›nij =uparÒw (dates on their strands) / kayarÒw (dates "cleaned off" the strands) reflect the perspectives of the grower and the purveyor / purchaser, respectively. <phoinix monoxulos, phoinix rhuparos / katharos>
bibl.seg: MAYERSON Philip, A Clarification of fo›nij monÒjulow and fo›nij kayarÒw / =uparÒw. <phoinix monoxulos, phoinix katharos / rhuparos>
